verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician,<s%> A Psalm of <S%H1732>David.<s%> In the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> put I my <S%H2620>trust:<s%> <S%H349>how<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> ye to my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> <S%H5110>Flee<s%> as a <S%H6833>bird<s%> to your <S%H2022>mountain?<s%>

For, <S%H3588><s%> <S%H2009>lo,<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H1869>bend<s%> their <S%H7198>bow,<s%> they make <S%H3559>ready<s%> their <S%H2671>arrow<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H3499>string,<s%> that they may <S%H1119>privily<s%> <S%H652><s%> <S%H3384>shoot<s%> at the <S%H3477>upright<s%> in <S%H3820>heart.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is in his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1964>temple,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H3678>throne<s%> is in <S%H8064>heaven:<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H2372>behold,<s%> his <S%H6079>eyelids<s%> <S%H974>try,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H974>trieth<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous:<s%> but the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> and him that <S%H157>loveth<s%> <S%H2555>violence<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H8130>hateth.<s%>

Upon <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> he shall <S%H4305>rain<s%> <S%H6341>snares,<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> and <S%H1614>brimstone,<s%> and a <S%H2152>horrible<s%> <S%H7307>tempest:<s%> this shall be the <S%H4521>portion<s%> of their <S%H3563>cup.<s%>
